overview: Shyla and Tara are celebrating their two year anniversary...but some truth is coming up, and the ladies are discovering they BOTH are cheating on each other! Is this the end of their loving lesbian relationship? Can couples therapy keep them together? Annabelle arrives in their time of need with a new approach to marriage counseling - dancing girls, a live sex show, and hot lesbian group sex! Now THAT is how you nurture a healthy lesbian relationship!
tagline: These girls take couples counseling to a new level!
title: Tara Loves Shyla
